body:
Follow these steps before you continue.

1. Go to a Mediation Information and Assessment Meeting (MIAM) or check if you have a [valid reason for not attending]({app:urls:url:miams-exemptions}).
2. Read the [child arrangements guide]({app:urls:url:cait}) to see if you need to go to court - there may be a more suitable way to reach an agreement.
3. [Get a reference number]({app:urls:url:help-with-fees}) if you’re eligible for help with the court fee.

(i) If you can make your arrangements out of court you’ll help families in urgent situations that involve domestic abuse get to court quicker.
heading: Before you start you application
